objects.text:
• Premium metallic blue & silver stonework
• Perfect complement to mehndi designs
• Sparkling rhinestones & ethnic patterns
• Ideal for wedding ceremonies

product_details.name: Elegant Blue Silk Bridal Bangles Set with Traditional Mehndi Design Collection
product_details.description:
• ✨ Premium metallic blue and silver bangles with intricate stone work
• 🎨 Perfect complement to traditional mehndi/henna designs
• 💎 Embedded with sparkling rhinestones and ethnic patterns
• 🌟 Luxurious dual-tone finish with antique metalwork
• 👑 Ideal for wedding ceremonies and special occasions
• 🎁 Complete set includes multiple sizes for perfect fit
• 🔨 Durable construction with high-quality materials
• ✅ Matches perfectly with traditional Indian attire
• 💫 Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear
• 🛍️ Comes in an elegant gift box for safe storage

banner_details:
This square bridal jewelry banner features a refined and traditional aesthetic for a mehndi-themed collection. The layout is anchored by two prominent headline text layers (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) in a bold serif font and vibrant blue color, emphasizing elegance and clarity. Supporting this is a golden tagline (`tagline`) that introduces the product line’s theme. Beneath it, a concise feature list in a dark neutral tone (`description`) outlines key selling points. The price element (`price`) is bold and eye-catching in gold, placed above a strong blue CTA button (`cta_background` and `cta`) inviting action. The design is enhanced with ornamental borders and waves. A detailed product photo (`product_image`) adds realism and cultural relevance. 

**Color Palette:**
- Royal Blue: #1A75BB
- Gold Ochre: #C09856
- Soft Ivory: #F8F1ED
- Charcoal: #333333
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image presents a vibrant and elegant color palette ideal for an advertisement banner. The dominant color is Royal Blue (#0076B6), featured prominently in the bangles and dupatta, giving the image richness and vibrance. Silver Gray (#C0C0C0) from the embroidered dress adds a touch of sophistication and contrasts subtly with the blue. The warm Henna Brown (#9C4A1A) of the Mehndi designs on the hands adds cultural charm and depth, balancing the cool tones. Accents of Pearl White (#F5F5F5) and Gold (#D4AF37) in jewelry and embellishments provide highlights. Together, these colors are harmoniously blended yet individually stand out beautifully.
